page.title: 19ARTS AND CRAFTS IN LEYBURN
page.content: ARTS:Pictures, drawings, prints and sculpture are exhibited at Chandler Gallery. Exhibits are changed often, and artists are mainly from North Yorkshire. CRAFTS:Artist-craftsmen in pottery, jewellery, glassware and weaving occasionally exhibit at Chandler Gallery. The shop sells such items, as well as hand crafted toys and garments in hand printed fabrics. Swineside Ceramics make hand crafted slip moulded earthenware. Copley Mouldings produce hand crafted cornices and ceiling roses in hard polyutherane. The Taxidermist prepares and mounts mammals and birds obtained locally. At Wensley Mill, candles are hand crafted in many shapes colours and sizes by dipping and moulding.
